channel.title: gear on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in gear on Konigi

item.title: Nick Finck's Gifts for User Experience Geeks 2011
item.description: If you're looking for gifts for your team, Nick Finck has once again rounded up a massive list of gear for UX geeks. Thanks, Nick. http://www.nickfinck.com/blog/entry/gifts_for_user_experience_geeks_2011/

item.title: Pencil Bandoliers for Journals and Sketchbooks
item.description: I'm in love with this Journal Bandolier made of recycled bike inner tubes, made by Cleverhands and sold on Etsy. The bandolier is a strap fitted with small loops for carrying pens, pencils, and other handy tools wrapped around a journal, planner, or other book. I ordered one for the small 3.5" wide Moleskine. Bandoliers for other notebook sizes available as well. http://www.etsy.com/listing/80431666/mini-bandolier-replace-your-pencil-case

item.title: The Setup
item.description: The Setup does nerdy interviews to find out what people use to get stuff done. http://sam.brown.usesthis.com/
